title: The rebellion a tragedy: as it was acted nine dayes together, and divers times since with good applause, by his Majesties Company of Revells. Written by Thomas Rawlins.
author: Rawlins, Thomas, 1620?-1670.
publisher: Printed by I. Okes, for Daniell Frere, and are to be sold at the signe of the Red Bull in Little Brittaine,
